name: Super Starbox
description:
A puzzle platformer where you pick up objects and manipulate them in order to open up and reach the exit.

The exit opens when you put all the stars on the starblocks.

Controls:
Arrow keys - move
Z - jump
X - pickup/put down object
F4 - toggle fullscreen (1366x768)
ESC - return to menu
P - pause
